comment._content: It's Princes Street, not princess (ie male, not female).  Nice collection mind.

comment.author: 76266660@N00
comment._content:
Wow--my wife and I got our wedding rings in a shop that would have been on the right side of this photo--though it *probably* wasn't there when the photo was taken ;)

Also, in other photos it actually is described as (and spelled) "Princess Street."  Perhaps it used to be called that?

comment.author: 47339697@N00
comment._content: No, it was named after two Princes.
